title: S12 Ep190: True Crime Tuesday Revisited:  Frustrated Witness: The True Story of the ADAM WALSH Case and Police Misconduct
itunes:title: True Crime Tuesday Revisited:  Frustrated Witness: The True Story of the ADAM WALSH Case and Police Misconduct
description:
When six-year-old Adam Walsh was abducted from the Hollywood Mall on July 27, 1981, no one could have guessed that it would take police almost thirty years to find the culprit or that even then they had still got it all so wrong.

Willis Morgan takes us on a dark journey to reveal a monster in Florida...a predator with motive, means and a terrifying history.
